> Hi All,
> 
> I need help with a simple user question.  I'd =
like to crawl only 
> html/doc/pdf files.  I created a filter to allow only=
 files with the 
> corresponding extensions, however it results in filterin=
g out uri's

 to 
> restrict my crawl to this subset of file types?
